title: Annual rainfall in Belgium 2006 to 2016
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Rainfall in millimeters, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Rainfall in millimeters has rose over the Year.

Rainfall in millimeters is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Rainfall in millimeters, about 977.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Rainfall in millimeters about 737.0 was reached at Year 2015
